episodeList.title: Reviving the Voices of Himeyuri - The Rebirth of the Museum 75 Years After the War

episode.description: Staff at the Himeyuri Peace Museum in Okinawa struggle to find ways to create exhibits that illustrate the atrocities of war more relatable for the young people of today, and have them value peace.
episode.title: Reviving the Voices of Himeyuri - The Rebirth of the Museum 75 Years After the War -
